attributes.additional_details:
To see england have its own form of devolved assembly along the same lines of the Scottish, NI and Welsh assembly.

With its own capital outside of London placed in a region that will best serve the whole of the north/midlands/south and southwest of england.

(If it is deemed necessary and is voted for, semi devolved parliaments for different regions could help maximise the benefits of a devolved parliament. while still having an english parliament which will work for the whole of england)

By being on the same level as the other 3 members of the union, england could deal with matters concerning england only, which will help the residents of england see the benefits that other devolved assembly's/parliaments have seen.

London will be better suited as the capital of the UK and would leave westminster to deal with only UK wide matters.
